text: Dennis Post (born 1946 or 1947) is a Dutch Paralympic table tennis player from Rotterdam. Post competed in the A1 table tennis disability class. At the 1965 national championships he finished third. After becoming several times national champion, he was selected to compete at the 1968 Summer Paralympics, where he won a gold and a silver medal. In the Singles A1 event he won the gold medal, and with female Aria Noordam he won the silver medal in the Doubles A1 event. == References == Category:Dutch Paralympic competitors Category:Dutch table tennis players Category:Living people
title: Dennis Post
